scripts.gen_proof: rm -rf build/proof && mkdir build/proof && npx snarkjs calculatewitness -c build/circuit/withdraw.json -i tests/circuit_input.json -w build/proof/witness.json --lo && snarkjs proof -w build/proof/witness.json --public build/proof/public.json --pk build/circuit/withdraw_proving_key.json -p build/proof/proof.json
scripts.build:circuit:compile: npx circom circuit/withdraw.circom -o build/circuit/withdraw.json && npx snarkjs info -c build/circuit/withdraw.json
scripts.build:circuit:setup: npx snarkjs setup --protocol groth -c build/circuit/withdraw.json --pk build/circuit/withdraw_proving_key.json --vk build/circuit/withdraw_verification_key.json
scripts.build:circuit: mkdir -p build/circuit && npm run build:circuit:compile && npm run build:circuit:setup && npm run build:circuit:bin && npm run gen_proof
scripts.build:verifier: npx asc assembly/merkle-tree/main.ts -b assembly/merkle-tree/out/main.wasm -t assembly/merkle-tree/out/main.wat --validate && cd assembly/merkle-tree && gulp
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:circuit && npm run build:verifier
